document.heading: National Capital Revitalization Corporation Eminent Domain Clarification and Skyland Eminent Domain Approval Amendment Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-286, the “National Capital Revitalization Corporation Eminent Domain Clarification and Skyland Eminent Domain Approval Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-752, which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2004, and December 7, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 29, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-679 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-286 became effective on April 5, 2005.
